description: Triangle T(n,k) of numbers of n degree irreducible polynomials over GF(2) which have order A059912(n,k), k=1..A059499(n).
links: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..71, flattened
formula: T(n,k) = phi(A059912(n,k))/n, where phi = Euler totient function A000010.
example: Triangle T(n,k) begins:2;1;2;1,  2;6;1,  2,   6;18;2,  4,   8, 16;8, 48;1,  2,   6, 30, 60;2,  8, 176;There are 9 (cf. A001037) irreducible polynomials of degree 6 over GF(2): 1 of order 9, 2 of order 21 and 6 of order 63 (cf. A059912).
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Feb 09 2001
